x_qune_da_error_code.remediation:
Verify if the Device Credentials are not locked out or expired.
(Ignore error if this is a Network Device or ESXi devices, as these devices are classified and populated by SNMP Discovery for Network Devices and vCenter Discovery for ESXi Devices.)
x_qune_da_error_code.root_cause:
SSH Credentials are locked out or expired.
Ignore if this is an SNMP Device (which is also responding to SSH Protocol as they are populated via SNMP Discovery). Ignore if this is an ESXi Host (which is also responding to SSH Protocol as they are populated via vCenter Discovery).
